plot outline: Shravana wants to sell his house, Shravana Nivasa, but there's a hitch - the house is haunted. He gets Raghupathi, Raghava, Raja and Ram to take up the job of removing the ghost. What follows is a series of hilarious incidents as they deal with the task at hand.
title: Mane Maratakkide
plot: A Dubai-based Indian decides to sell his house after the death of his parents. But, the old mansion is haunted and selling it is an uphill task. Why is the house haunted?

Shravana wants to sell his house, Shravana Nivasa, but there's a hitch - the house is haunted. He gets Raghupathi, Raghava, Raja and Ram to take up the job of removing the ghost. What follows is a series of hilarious incidents as they deal with the task at hand.::anonymous
